title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: The Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project menu item is not always available.
EB: The Open Project and Close Project menu items should always be available.
SR:
1. Launch the application. 
2. Select both P1 and P2 from the project list.
3. Observe the availability of the Open Project and Close Project menu items.
